trans-unit.source: Provides a low-level encapsulation of a window handle and a window procedure.
trans-unit.target: Gir et nivå innkapsling av et vindushåndtak og en vindusprosedyre.

trans-unit.source: This class automatically manages window class creation and registration.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen administrerer automatisk klassen oppretting og registrering.

trans-unit.source: A window is not eligible for garbage collection when it is associated with a window handle.
trans-unit.target: Et vindu er ikke kvalifisert for datasanering når den er knyttet til et vindushåndtak.

trans-unit.source: To ensure proper garbage collection, handles must either be destroyed manually using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DestroyHandle%2A> or released using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: For å sikre at riktig datasanering må håndtak enten være ødelagt manuelt ved å bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DestroyHandle%2A>eller frigitt ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DestroyHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A> method is called when the WM_NCDESTROY message is processed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>metoden kalles når WM_NCDESTROY meldingen behandles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means there are cases in which when you do not need to manually call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>, but it is good practice to do so.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at det finnes tilfeller i som når du ikke trenger å kalle manuelt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>, men det er lurt å gjøre so.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NativeWindow class provides the following properties and methods to manage handles: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DestroyHandle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Klassen NativeWindow gir følgende egenskaper og metoder for å administrere håndtak: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DestroyHandle%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DestroyHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This is the default NativeWindow constructor provided by the compiler.
trans-unit.target: Dette er NativeWindow Standardkonstruktøren fra kompilatoren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> class also has a static constructor that initializes application domain-wide message handlers and hash tables.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>klassen også er en statisk konstruktør som Initialiserer programmet hele domenet meldingen behandlingsprogrammer og hash-tabeller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>

trans-unit.source: Assigns a handle to this window.
trans-unit.target: Tilordner en referanse til dette vinduet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A> intercepts window messages sent to the `handle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A>fanger vindusmeldinger som er sendt til den `handle` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A> to reset the handle's window procedure to the default window procedure.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>tilbakestille det håndtaket vinduet prosedyren til standard vinduet prosedyren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AssignHandle method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A> method to indicate that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall AssignHandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A>metode for å angi som verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>egenskapen er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The handle to assign cannot be in a different application process.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Håndtaket for å tilordne kan ikke være et annet program pågår.

trans-unit.source: The handle to assign to this window.
trans-unit.target: Referansen for tilordning til dette vinduet.

trans-unit.source: This window already has a handle.
trans-unit.target: Dette vinduet har allerede en referanse.

trans-unit.source: The windows procedure for the associated native window could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke hente windows-prosedyren for tilknyttede opprinnelige vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a window and its handle with the specified creation parameters.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et vindu og håndtaket med de angitte oppretting.

trans-unit.source: The `cp` parameter specifies the values that are passed to the native Win32 `CreateWindowEx` method to create a window and its handle.
trans-unit.target: Den `cp` parameteren angir verdiene som er sendt til den opprinnelige Win32 `CreateWindowEx` metode for å opprette et vindu og håndtaket.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A> field is not `null`, the newly created window handle inherits from the specified class.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>ikke `null`, nyopprettede vinduet håndtaket arver fra den angitte klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A> is set to `BUTTON`, the newly created window is based on the Win32 `BUTTON` window class.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>er satt til `BUTTON`, vinduet nyopprettede er basert på Win32 `BUTTON` vinduet klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Param%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A> object must either be `null` or reference an instance of a class that was declared as a structure.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Param%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>objektet må være enten `null` eller referere til en forekomst av en klasse som ble deklarert som en struktur.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Param%2A>

trans-unit.source: This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Denne koden er et utdrag fra eksemplet som vises i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>

trans-unit.source: Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity.
trans-unit.target: Kode vises ikke hensikten korte navn.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> for the whole code listing.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>hele code-liste.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The class name provided is registered with the operating system.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Klassenavn angitt er registrert med operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that specifies the creation parameters for this window.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> som angir oppretting av parameterne for dette vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The operating system ran out of resources when trying to create the native window.
trans-unit.target: Operativsystemet gikk tom for ressurser under forsøk på å opprette det opprinnelige vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 API could not create the specified window.
trans-unit.target: Opprinnelig Win32 API kan ikke opprette det angitte vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The handle of the current native window is already assigned; in explanation, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle*> property is not equal to <xref:System.IntPtr.Zero>.
trans-unit.target: Behandlingen av gjeldende opprinnelig vindu er allerede tildelt; i forklaring <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle*>egenskapen er ikke lik <xref:System.IntPtr.Zero>.</xref:System.IntPtr.Zero> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle*>

trans-unit.source: Invokes the default window procedure associated with this window.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer standard vindusprosedyre som er knyttet til dette vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you only call the DefWndProc method when you are intercepting window messages and would like the default window procedure to handle the message.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis kalle du bare metoden DefWndProc når du avskjærer vindusmeldinger og vil standard vinduet fremgangsmåten for å behandle meldingen.

trans-unit.source: DefWndProc should not be called to send a window message to the window; call the Win32 `SendMessage` function instead.
trans-unit.target: DefWndProc skal ikke kalles for å sende en melding i vinduet til vinduet. kall Win32 `SendMessage` -funksjonen i stedet.

trans-unit.source: It is an error to call DefWndProc when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> property is 0.
trans-unit.target: Det er feil å kalle DefWndProc når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>egenskapen er 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that is currently being processed.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen behandles for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: Destroys the window and its handle.
trans-unit.target: Ødelegger vinduet og håndtaket.

trans-unit.source: This method destroys the window associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>, sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> property to 0, and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A> method to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden ødelegger vinduet knyttet til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>, angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>egenskapen til 0, og kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A>metode for å gjenspeile endringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you only call DestroyHandle when you are done with the native window.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis kalle du bare DestroyHandle når du er ferdig med opprinnelig vinduet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> class automatically will destroy the associated window and release its resources in response to a WM_DESTROY message.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>klassen automatisk skal fjerne tilknyttede vinduet og frigjøre ressursene som svar på meldingen WM_DESTROY.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources associated with this window.
trans-unit.target: Frigir ressursene som er knyttet til dette vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The Finalize method removes the Win32 derived class associated with the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> instance, releases the handle, and posts a WM_CLOSE message to the associated window.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Fullfør fjerner Win32 avledet-klassen som er knyttet til gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>forekomsten frigir håndtaket og legger en WM_CLOSE melding i vinduet tilknyttede.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the window associated with the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: Henter vinduet knyttet til den angitte referansen.

trans-unit.source: If you receive a handle from another method, use this method to retrieve the window associated with the handle.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får et håndtak fra en annen metode, kan du bruke denne metoden for å hente vinduet som er forbundet med referansen.

trans-unit.source: The handle must already be owned by another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> in the current process; otherwise, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Referansen må allerede eies av en annen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>i gjeldende behandle; ellers, `null` returneres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>

trans-unit.source: A handle to a window.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til et vindu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow"></xref> associated with the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow"> </xref> knyttet til den angitte referansen.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> when the handle does not have an associated window.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> når håndtaket ikke har en tilknyttet vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle for this window.
trans-unit.target: Henter referansen for dette vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when calling Windows API methods that require a handle for a window or control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden under kall av Windows-API-metoder som krever en referanse til et vindu eller kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If successful, an <xref:System.IntPtr> representing the handle to the associated native Win32 window; otherwise, 0 if no handle is associated with the window.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.IntPtr>som representerer referansen til det tilknyttede opprinnelig Win32-vinduet; ellers, 0 Hvis ingen referansen er knyttet til vinduet.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Specifies a notification method that is called when the handle for a window is changed.
trans-unit.target: Angir en varslingsmetode kalles når referansen for et vindu er endret.

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden aktiveres når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>egenskapen er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, manages an unhandled thread exception.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, administrerer et ubehandlet tråd-unntak.

trans-unit.source: Typically, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.OnThreadException%2A> handles thread exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.OnThreadException%2A>håndtak tråd unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.OnThreadException%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that specifies the unhandled thread exception.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som angir et ubehandlet tråd-unntak.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Releases the handle associated with this window.
trans-unit.target: Frigir håndtaket knyttet til dette vinduet.

trans-unit.source: This method does not destroy the window handle.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden ødelegger ikke vindusreferanse.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it sets the handle's window procedure to the default window procedure.
trans-unit.target: I stedet angir det håndtaket vinduet prosedyren i standard vinduet prosedyren.

trans-unit.source: It sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> property to 0 and calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A> to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: Den angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>egenskapen 0 og kall <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A>å gjenspeile endringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A window automatically calls this method if it receives a native Win32 WM_NCDESTROY message, indicating that Windows has destroyed the handle.
trans-unit.target: Et vindu kaller automatisk denne metoden hvis den mottar en opprinnelig Win32 WM_NCDESTROY-melding, som angir at Windows er ødelagt referansen.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the default window procedure associated with this window.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer standard vindusprosedyre som er knyttet til dette vinduet.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a window message is sent to the handle of the window.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når en melding i vinduet sendes til behandlingen av vinduet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> that is associated with the current Windows message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> som er knyttet til gjeldende Windows-melding.
